name: It Takes Children
description:
You are a single mom who lives with her son in a suburban home. One day, you find your son James talking to an imaginary friend he calls Laughing Jack. But as strange things begin to happen around the house, you soon discover that maybe Laughing Jack isn't so imaginary after all.

The game is very short. You can probably beat it in about 5-10 minutes. There is only one ending.
